summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from August 1, 2016, to August 31, 2016. It details deposits, checks paid, and outgoing transfers, including significant transactions to Solano Builders and Construction LLC. The document highlights the account's financial activity during this period.

persons.name: Solano Builders and Construction LLC
persons.context: Mentioned as a recipient of outgoing money transfers from the account.

events.title: Account Activity Summary
events.description: Summary of account balance and transactions for the month of August 2016.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: A significant outgoing money transfer of $15,000.00 to Solano Builders and Construction LLC.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details account transactions for Deutsche Bank from August 1, 2016, to August 31, 2016.
The account had a beginning balance of $175,945.77 and an ending balance of $137,991.76.
Significant outgoing transfers included $1,600.00 and $15,000.00 to Solano Builders and Construction LLC.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return items reported for this statement period.
The document includes instructions for disputing errors on the account statement.
